features.featureTitle: Rewrite the form submission handler in `frontend/src/components/AdminAccessControl.tsx` so that: (1) the root element is a `<form>` with an `onSubmit` handler (not an `onClick` only), so pressing Enter in the username input natively triggers submission; (2) the Submit button has `type="submit"` so both Enter key and button click invoke the same handler; (3) the `onSubmit` handler calls `event.preventDefault()` to prevent page reload, then calls the backend `isAdminUsername` function with the exact string the user typed; (4) a local loading/spinner state is set to true while the call is in-flight and reset to false when it resolves; (5) if the backend returns `true`, local status transitions to `'granted'` and the children are rendered; (6) if the backend returns `false`, local status transitions to `'denied'` and `AccessDeniedScreen` is rendered; (7) any thrown error from the backend call is caught in a try/catch and displayed as an inline error message beneath the input field rather than being swallowed silently; (8) the retry/back option on `AccessDeniedScreen` resets local status back to the initial form state so the user can try again. The sunset theme (dusk-bg/dusk-mid backgrounds, sunset-gold/sunset-orange accent colours, Orbitron/Rajdhani fonts, sunset glow effects) must be preserved on the form.
